alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Accomack County through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parksley, or 16 miles south of Pocomoke City, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bloxom, Hallwood, Horntown, Mappsville, Greenbackville, Wallops Island, Temperanceville, Nelsonia, Modest Town, Oak Hall, Assawoman, Atlantic and New Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
